project-description_metagenome_name: Norwegian Fjord Phytoplankton Bloom mRNA Present Day Post Bloom Metagenome
sample-isolation-and-treatment_sample_is: Water samples were taken at the peak and immediately following the collapse of the phytoplankton bloom. Briefly, water samples from the coastal mesocosm were collected and processed as follows: 15 l of water from four samples was filtered through a 1.6 μm GF/A filter (Whatman) to remove most phytoplankton cells and this filtrate was collected on 0.22 μm Sterivex filters (Millipore) which were pumped dry, frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at −80°C until nucleic acid extraction.
sample-origin_location: coastal waters of a fjord close to Bergen, Norway
sequences_sequences_predicted_genes: Metagenome data cosist of predicted genes
sequencing_sequencing_center: NERC-funded University of Liverpool 454 Sequencing Facility
